title: The Making of Zeprium
summary: A website is not just a showcase — it can be a space of reflection, evolution, and dialogue. In this opening post, I share the thoughts behind Zeprium's making: how it was built not by code alone, but by a series of intentional decisions, questions, and collaborations — including with AI.
summary_zh: 一个网站，不只是作品的展台，更是思考流动与自我协作的空间。在这篇开篇文章中，我分享了 Zeprium 的诞生故事：它不是靠一行行代码堆砌出来的，而是由一个个决定、一次次重构和一次独特的 AI 协作共同完成的。

title: Design is a Way of Thinking
summary: Exploring the fundamental principles that guide effective and engaging web design in today's digital landscape.
summary_zh: 在我的第十个设计年中，一个越来越清晰的体悟逐渐浮现：设计不应仅被视为工具层面的技艺或界面层的修饰，而是可以作为一种深层次的"认知结构"与思维模式来审视。
